distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for gimp fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-44442: Fixed PSD File Parsing Heap-based (bsc#1217161).
- CVE-2023-44444: Fixed PSP File Parsing Off-By-One (bsc#1217163).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use
